title: Honey Soy Chicken Stir Fry
overview: A delicious stir fry with chicken, vegetables, and a sweet, tangy honey soy sauce.

ingredients.title: Main
content: 500 g Chicken breast or thigh fillets
1 cup Red capsicum, cut into strips

stages.title: Step 1
content: Place cornflour in a jug. Gradually blend with water. Add soy sauce, honey, and ginger, and stir to combine. Set aside.

stages.title: Step 2
content: To cook the rice, massage the pouch to separate the grains and microwave according to the package instructions. Set aside.

stages.title: Step 3
content: Heat oil in a large non-stick frying pan or wok over high heat. Add chicken and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Reduce the heat slightly, then add carrot, broccoli, and capsicum; stir-fry for another 3 minutes. Finally, add green onions and garlic and stir-fry for an additional minute.

stages.title: Step 4
content: Stir the honey soy mixture from Step 1, then add it to the frying pan. Simmer for 2 minutes, stirring until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender-crisp. Serve with rice and garnish with extra green onions.
